article.headline: New York City schools in COVID-19 hotspots to close
article.body: Schools located in New York COVID-19 hotpots, including several ZIP codes in Brooklyn and Queens will close Tuesday, Gov. Andrew Cuomo announced. Additionally, the governor said a 50% capacity limit at churches and synagogues must be enforced. Whether to close non-essential businesses in these areas has yet to be determined, he said. --Pete Catapano
